1.0.1.name: wordpress/vikispot
1.0.1.description:
VikiSpot let you embed related dynamic content, such as related images, videos, news, and blogs to your posts.

Demo:

  • WordPress Demo
  • Android App
  • Live Demo Playground
  • Multi Languages Demo
  • Example Sites

Features:

  • Fetch and Display Dynamic Content
    • Related News
    • Related Videos
    • Related Blogs
  • Widget Types
    • Content Widget
    • Stream Widget
